name: Mr. Meteor
description:
-DETAILS-

Mr. Meteor is a man who has nothing to lose while dodging massive meatballs.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

Not super hard. This is also my first game uploaded to itch.io

-CONTROLS-

A and D to move as showed in-game.

-CREDITS-

music - bread by LuKremBo on Youtube.

explosion particle - Free Unity asset by Unity.

enjoy the game :D

- totallyadevsheep
